thread.section_title: Ibis London Euston St Pancras - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Worst night sleep ever in a hotel
thread.title_full: Worst night sleep ever in a hotel - Review of Ibis London Euston St Pancras, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: KSutton
title: Worst night sleep ever in a hotel
text:
Room 195 - sounded like the underground was directly below and had train noise every 2 minutes except for a few hours between 1 and 5am. In addition, the walls between rooms were incredibly thin and I had to listen to next door's TV and various bathroom noises....
The bed was ok but the curtain did not shut properly so light was streaming in from early on.
Great location for Euston. Super friendly staff but the lack of a good quality night of sleep means I would never return to this hotel again.
